welcome.title: Welcome to Your Safe Space
welcome.intro: I'm Serenity, your compassionate AI companion. I'm here to listen, support, and provide resources for your emotional wellbeing. This is a judgment-free space where your feelings matter.
welcome.safeAndPrivateDesc: Your conversations are confidential and secure
welcome.available247Desc: I'm here whenever you need support
welcome.importantDisclaimer: I'm an AI assistant designed to provide emotional support and resources. While I'm here to listen and help, I'm not a replacement for professional therapy, medical care, or crisis intervention. If you're experiencing a mental health emergency, please contact emergency services or a crisis hotline immediately.
welcome.readyToStart: Ready to start? Share what's on your mind, or simply say hello.

messageInput.disclaimer: Serenity AI provides support but is not a replacement for professional therapy or medical care.
